definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

pinyin: chong2 fu4 shi3 li4 shang1 hai4

sentences.english: We will take good care and properly protect the patients vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 并且对于易受伤害患者予以优先照顾和妥善保护。

sentences.english: But formaldehyde is virulent, that must do a great harm to the persons.
sentences.chinese: 因为甲醛有剧毒，会对人体造成很大的伤害。

sentences.english: The new policy on food price will hurt the interest of people on low incomes.
sentences.chinese: 新的食品价格政策将伤害到低收入人群的利益。

sentences.english: Hit with a critical and your looking incredible damage done.
sentences.chinese: 等着看你惊人的暴击伤害吧。

sentences.english: The overpressure wave is actually the more dangerous of the two.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这两类伤害中超压冲击波尤甚。

sentences.english: But two wrongs can never make a right, because two wrongs can never equal each other.
sentences.chinese: 冤冤相报永无终止，因为两种伤害永远不能抵消。

sentences.english: Would you extend apologies to those you may have wronged or hurt?
sentences.chinese: 你会向那些你冤枉过伤害过的人道歉吗？

sentences.english: Until last hurt, I will not awake?
sentences.chinese: 直到最后的伤害，我才肯醒悟吗？

sentences.english: and damaging, but it's a lot healthier.
sentences.chinese: 也会伤害头发，但总体来说更健康。

sentences.english: Moderate shade can protect shade endurance plants from photooxidation injury.
sentences.chinese: 适度遮荫可以有效的防止耐荫植物发生光氧化伤害。

sentences.english: He uses the power of nature to damage and inhibit his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 他使用自然之力去伤害并抑止他的敌人。

sentences.english: And we're a delicate species, with a long list of wants.
sentences.chinese: 我们是一种易受伤害的种类，有着一系列的需求。

sentences.english: The respondent shall not be liable for compensating the injuries for RST.
sentences.chinese: 答辩人对RST伤害赔偿不应承担责任。

sentences.english: It hurts them, and then it hurts your reputation.
sentences.chinese: 这会伤害他们，也会损害你的名声。

sentences.english: This has meant disappointments and compromises that are now causing the party harm.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着失望与妥协现在正造成工党的伤害。

sentences.english: Pardoning the bad, is injuring the good.
sentences.chinese: 对恶者的宽容，即是对善者的伤害。

definition: to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
